rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C177906

definition: A terminology value set relevant to the attributes of the ingredient.
name: Ingredient Attribute Terminology

terms.definition: Any ingredient intended for use in the manufacture of a drug product, including those that may not appear in such drug product. (FDA 21 CFR 314.3(a))
A characterization or classification of the component that constitutes a part of a compound or mixture.
